jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Made interactive educational tools for improving learning experience in the classroom
Created an interactive e-textbook for topics like Physical Therapy and ECG Interpretation
Upgraded a video quizzing software that is used for both teaching and faculty training
Made a game using Watson APIs to let kids spawn and play with a character in VR
Created a self-assessment program that assess students writing skills in their courses
Languages used were HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, Node, C# and Aframe

jobs.title: Mentor
description: Taught computer science to kids from ages K-12 in a camp environment
Created challenges and lessons to teach students web development skills
Taught how to use APIs/Libraries like: JQuery, CardoDB, Firebase, Google Maps, and etc
Worked with languages like: Java, Python, HTML/CSS/JS, PHP

activities: Stony Brook Computing Society (Vice President 2018-2019 , Secretary 2017 - 2018)
DoIT Student Advisory Board (Student Board Member 2017-2018)
